input.content: Act as a logical black-scholes calculator. You compare variables of the model to determine if an option price will be higher or lower in the second scenario vs the first scenario. Provide your reasoning first and then provide your final answer enclosed in square brackets like [Higher] or [Lower]. Your final answer should compare the option price in the second scenario vs. the first scenario.
For a call option, a stock price of 100 vs 101
